CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultUncommonSk.NAME: A Better Defend
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultUncommonSk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultAttackWith.NAME: Special Strike
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultAttackWith.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !cloinsimprovedironclad:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultSecondMagi.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
CloinsImprovedIronclad:DefaultSecondMagi.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !cloinsimprovedironclad:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:ParryAndRiposte.NAME: Parry and Riposte
CloinsImprovedIronclad:ParryAndRiposte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack NL gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.
CloinsImprovedIronclad:ParryAndRiposte.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack NL gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Exhaust.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Duster.NAME: Duster
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Duster.DESCRIPTION: Draw up to !M! Status Cards from your draw pile.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Pinch.NAME: Pinch
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Pinch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain 1 Strength.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:EXClash.NAME: EX Clash
CloinsImprovedIronclad:EXClash.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4 damage. NL If there are only Attacks in your hand NL Deal !D! damage.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Momentum.NAME: Demonic Gambit
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your deck. Lose 2 Dexterity.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Refuse.NAME: Choking Gas Bomb
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Refuse.DESCRIPTION: If this card is discarded from your hand, NL Apply !M! #yChoked to All Enemies.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Ferment.NAME: Fermenting Poison
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Ferment.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Permanently Increase Poison applied by this card by 2. NL Exhaust.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Viscous.NAME: Viscous Poison
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Viscous.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Versatility.NAME: Versatile Strike
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Versatility.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL This card's effect depends on your class.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:Pocket.NAME: Pocketed
CloinsImprovedIronclad:Pocket.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack NL Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:StrikeFear.NAME: Strike Fear
CloinsImprovedIronclad:StrikeFear.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weakened to an enemy 3 times. NL Exhaust.

CloinsImprovedIronclad:CallDown.NAME: Call Down
CloinsImprovedIronclad:CallDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-on to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
